welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gyal, Hungary! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and indulge in all that Gyal has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Lufthansa, British Airways, and Air France.

terminals.name: Terminal 2B
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost airlines such as Ryanair, Wizz Air, and EasyJet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and regional flights for airlines such as LOT Polish Airlines and Austrian Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by providing their email address.
